description:
ATTENTION: Authors, Speakers, Coaches, Consultants and Udemy Publishers…

Are you ready to beat the pants off of last year’s income from a proven profit hack?

This unusual system could help you turn a $39 info product into $50,000 within 45 days!

No one else is teaching this, and every step is clearly detailed for you!

This unknown advanced business strategy has been quietly helping information businesses to easily and quickly turn their struggling business into a turn-key, high revenue business in 45 days or less!

The training program you are about to get access to, was taken from a sold-out private business bootcamp that attendees paid $1,997 each to get in. During this event I detailed exactly how everyone in that audience could double, triple or quadruple the revenue in almost their information business in 45 days or less, and I showed them, step-by step, exactly how I and my clients do this in our companies...

...then I handed them the exact blueprints to take home and duplicate those results!

Here’s what a few of them, and what some of my clients had to say:

"Thanks To Chris I Had My First Million Dollar NET Income Year In A Down Economy..." - Jeff Andersen

"Chris' Advice Resulted In over $500,000 In Increased Revenue... Matt Gill"

"Working With Chris Has Made A 7-Figure Difference In Our Bottom Line!" - Bill McIntosh

"Thanks To Chris I Now Make $10,000 - $20,000 Per Month And Take A Lot Of Vacations!" - Salvatore Vanutini

"Thanks to Chris I made an additional $71,000 In The First 2 Weeks, and $356,000 In The First 4 Months! - Nikhil Parekh

"We just had our First 6 Figure Day! Thank You Chris For All Your Help!” - Marie O’Riordan

Long Story short, I'm now doing $50,000USD/month. AND THIS IS IN A VERY CHALLENGING MARKET! This is a solid, recurring income! Thanks to what I learned from Chris. - Ray Wood

"What Chris teaches helped me double my business in this last 12 months.” - Barry Kloogh

Literally 1 week after implementing an idea he gave me, I had a $60,000 contract signed and paid for! …within another few weeks I closed another $100,000 in consulting contracts. I have gone from ‘how am I going to pay all my bills’ to exceeding my wildest dreams. Finally I am able to do what I love and get paid a top dollar for my time. Thanks Chris!!! - Dave Sierdeski

And now for the first time ever, you get an all access pass to the exact same video footage, plus the workbook (blueprint) that reveals it all and walks you through every step…

And the truth, the whole truth and nothing but the truth is this...

You will learn more in this 1 hour course than most people can teach you in 1 year, because I live it, breathe it, do it and profit from it... and have duplicated it with my students.

Now, let’s get a few things clear right now. With this course there is:

  • No theories, what you get is all profit-tested
  • No guesswork, what you get is all proven to work
  • No rehashed content, what you get is all original
  • No basic stuff, what you get is advanced training
  • No fluff or filler, what you get is all meat and potatoes

This is not just a course; this is literally a battle-tested profit-proven fail-safe blueprint to generating maximum revenue from information products, over and over and over again....

So, if you want to;

  • Increase your income
  • Kill your day job
  • Build your business
  • Destroy your debt
  • Prove the naysayers wrong

Then join me in this course today. Once inside, you’ll be glad you have this information, and your competition doesn’t. Because what you’ll have access to literally stops the competition, and puts you on another playing field all together...

...a far more profitable playing field!

Here’s just a sampling of what you get instant access to:

  • 3 irrefutable but little-known ways you can immediate grow your profits – even if you have very little experience. This is the secret sauce to pulling in $50,000 clients (think that’s too big? I did too! So I started with $18,000 clients to prove to myself that this works - and you can start lower if you want too - but you must be open to the idea of growth because that’s what I’ll push you into through this program).
  • The quickest way to convert low-end “product buyers” into “high end paying clients”.
  • A sure-fire way to instantly build your credibility and smoke the competition. This will work wonders for you because your competitors won’t be doing this the way I lay it out for you.
  • The absolute most effective way to generate sales quickly even if you have no list and no reputation. I’ve tweaked this several times to the point that it creates monster sales conversions for anyone who uses it correctly.
  • How to follow up on your low-end buyers without pestering them, in a way that converts them into high-end, happy buyers. I’ve had clients profusely thank me for using this follow-up method.

In How To Turn A $39 Info Product Into $50,000 Within 45 Days, I'll deliver all this knowledge to you personally.

You also get these 5 priceless bonuses:

  • The exact 33 slides I used for this presentation. You get to see the tools, the sales funnels, and the sales copy I use to take $39 buyers and rocket them to $50,000 clients.
  • FREE Marketing Checklist so you have your butt covered in your marketing to get maximum results without missing a beat. This is the same checklist I personally use in my business.
  • FREE Product Planning Checklist to ensure you don’t overlook some of the invaluable items that your buyers may love to have and pay you immediately for.
  • FREE Promotion Checklist that reveals low-cost and no-cost ways that are proven to drive the traffic you need right now.
  • FREE “How-To” Template that gives you the winning formula for how to put together any how-to information for articles, reports, audios, videos… you name it.

By following the advance marketing method I’ll share with you here, you’ll see exactly how to quickly transform your business into an industry leader, and how to truly grow your income and change your life.

But don’t just take my word for it. Even other experts praise the results and impact of my work:

"Chris is the Master Millionaire Maker!" - Mark Victor Hansen co-creator of the famous “Chicken Soup for the Soul” series

"Chris is Brilliant. I Highly Recommend Him If You're Ready To Grow Your Company" - Joe Sugarman (creator of Blu-Blocker sunglasses)

“This man is an absolute genius, and we do exactly what he tells us. Use what you learn here and follow his instruction to the letter ... you’ll be glad you did.” - Bob Proctor (from the movie - The Secret)
title: Grow Your Business Better, Faster, Smarter
